page.title: 18THE FONABY SACK
page.content: Originally this stone sack stood upright in the middle of the field, but years ago it was moved to the base of the hedge to help ploughing. Now all that remains are the two separate pieces of grey stone peering out of the ground. Every summer brings a number of people who are interested in the stone and its curse and at least one farmworker still respects the landmark and its secrets. A well known local figure has worked the land around the {Stone Sack for these past thirty years from a farm at Fonaby Top (which is a matter of yards from the fabled field and its mystic contents). The field is actually named {Stone Sack Field.}He said, 'This stone has stopped in the middle of the field for donkey's years and then somebody decided to move it.
